PHRASE.LANG: This hot cocoa means you can chat with your friends and still stay warm all winter. Don’t feel obligated to share your cocoa with anyone. [#Legal]
Ce chocolat chaud vous permet de discuter avec vos amis en restant au chaud tout l'hiver. Pas besoin de le partager avec tout le monde. [#Legal]

Dank heißer Schokolade kann man im Winter stundenlang mit der Clique plaudern und friert trotzdem nicht. Natürlich ist niemand verpflichtet, seine heiße Schokolade mit den anderen zu teilen ... [#Legal]
Questa cioccolata calda permette di parlare con gli amici mentre ci si riscalda durante l'inverno. Non si è obbligati a condividere la cioccolata con nessuno. [#Legal]
Con este cacao caliente podéis conversar con vuestros amigos y manteneros calientes en invierno. No es necesario que compartáis vuestro cacao con nadie. [#Legal]
이 따듯한 코코아만 있으면 겨울 내내 따듯하게 친구들과 채팅을 할 수 있습니다. 코코아를 남들과 나눠 마실 필요는 없어요. [#Legal]
This hot cocoa means you can chat with your friends and still stay warm all winter. Don’t feel obligated to share your cocoa with anyone. [#Legal]
有了這杯熱可可，你便可和好友聊天。 [#Legal]
有了這杯熱可可，你便可和好友聊天。 [#Legal]
This hot cocoa means you can chat with your friends and still stay warm all winter. Don’t feel obligated to share your cocoa with anyone. [#Legal]
